SQL.FetchBondSmallViewSQL: SELECT bsv.listed_market, bsv.bond_key_listed_market, bsv.bond_id, bsv.bond_subtype, bsv.issuer_rating_current, bsv.maturity_term, bsv.create_date, bsv.short_name, bsv.warranter, bsv.coupon_type, bsv.rating_augment, bsv.rating_date, bsv.option_type, bsv.pin_yin, bsv.pin_yin_full, bsv.delflag, bsv.coupon_rate_current, bsv.maturity_date, bsv.listed_date, bsv.delisted_date, bsv.issuer_code, bsv.next_coupon_date, bsv.redemption_no, bsv.is_cross_mkt, bsv.is_mortgage, bsv.rating_current, bsv.bond_key, bsv.mkt_type, bsv.interest_start_date, bsv.frn_index_id, bsv.fixing_ma_days, bsv.coupon_rate_spread, bsv.option_date, bsv.issue_amount, bsv.underwriter_code, bsv.issuer_rating_institution_code, bsv.term_unit, bsv.rating_institution_code, bsv.is_municipal, bsv.issuer_rating_current_npy, bsv.rating_current_npy, bsv.issue_year, bsv.ent_cor, IF(bsv.coupon_type = 'FRN', IF(bsv.coupon_rate_spread IS NOT NULL, CONCAT(bsv.coupon_rate_spread, '%'), NULL), NULL) AS coupon_rate_spread_client, IF(bsv.option_date IS NOT NULL, CONCAT(ROUND(DATEDIFF(bsv.option_date, bsv.interest_start_date)/365,2), '+', ROUND(DATEDIFF(bsv.maturity_date, bsv.option_date)/365,2)), NULL) AS option_type_client, IF(bsv.redemption_no > 0, 'æ˜¯', '') AS redemption_no_client, CONCAT(ROUND(bsv.maturity_term, 2), bsv.term_unit) AS maturity_term_client, IF(bsv.coupon_rate_current IS NULL OR bsv.coupon_rate_current = 0, NULL, CONCAT(bsv.coupon_rate_current, '%')) AS coupon_rate_current_client, IF(bsv.option_date IS NULL OR bsv.option_date >= bsv.maturity_date OR bsv.option_date >= m.tmp_date, bsv.maturity_date, bsv.option_date) AS sort_remain, IF((bsv.delisted_date IS NULL OR bsv.delisted_date > m.tmp_date) AND bsv.maturity_date > m.tmp_date, FALSE, TRUE) AS is_expired, m.code AS goods_type_client, m.type_id AS bond_goods_type_id, m.product AS product_type FROM bond_small_view bsv, (SELECT bts.id, bts.type_id, bts.selective_code, bgt.name, bgt.code, bgt.description, bgt.product, cast(CURRENT_DATE AS DECIMAL(8,0)) AS tmp_date FROM bond_type_selective bts LEFT JOIN bond_goods_type bgt ON bts.status='1' AND bgt.status='1' AND bts.type_id=bgt.id)m WHERE bsv.delflag='0' AND bsv.bond_subtype=m.selective_code AND m.product IN('BCO','BNC');
SQL.FetchIssuingInstitutionSQL: SELECT DISTINCT id, institution_code, institution_type, full_name_c, delflag, Pin_Yin, Pin_Yin_Full, institution_subtype, institution_Rating FROM institution WHERE delflag = '0';

bid_return_point) AS bid_return_point, IF(ofr_return_point is NULL, -999, ofr_return_point) AS ofr_return_point, IF(bid_full_price is NULL, -999, bid_full_price) AS bid_full_price, IF(ofr_full_price SQL.FetchBondTraderSQL: SELECT id, company_id, name, code, f_code, attribute, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, attribute4, attribute5, create_time, status, flag, flag_vip, flag_bad, flag_bargain, bank_id, customer_id, pinyin, pinyin_full, modify_time, crm_id FROM bond_bank_agent WHERE status = '1';
SQL.FetchChinaBondValuationSQL: SELECT id, bond_id, listed_market, valuation_yield, valuation_net_price, valuation_date, status, modify_time, bond_key_listed_market, val_modified_duration, val_convexity, val_basis_point_value FROM (SELECT cbv.id, cbv.bond_id, cbv.listed_market, cbv.valuation_yield, cbv.valuation_net_price, cbv.valuation_date, cbv.status, cbv.modify_time, cbv.bond_key_listed_market, cbv.val_modified_duration, cbv.val_convexity, cbv.val_basis_point_value FROM china_bond_valuation cbv INNER JOIN bond_small_view bsv ON cbv.bond_id = bsv.bond_id AND cbv.listed_market = bsv.listed_market AND bsv.delflag = '0' WHERE cbv.status = '1' ORDER BY cbv.valuation_date DESC) tmp GROUP BY bond_id ORDER BY valuation_date DESC;
SQL.FetchBondGroupSQL: SELECT id, company_id, ua_id, group_name, status, create_time, ua_flag, filter_condition FROM bond_goods_group WHERE ua_flag = '2' AND status = '1';
SQL.FetchBondGroupDetailSQL: SELECT id, group_id, create_time, bond_key_listed_market FROM bond_group_relation;
SQL.FetchAccountSQL: SELECT DISTINCT ia.id, ia.company_id, sc.name as company_name, ia.account_code, ia.username, ia.password, ia.display_name, ia.mobile, ia.telephone, ia.email, ia.rm, ia.msn, ia.qq, ia.address, ia.account_type, ia.is_forbidden, ia.create_time, ia.modify_time, ia.create_by, ia.modify_by, ia.status, iarr.role_id FROM idb_account ia INNER JOIN idb_bond.sys_company sc ON ia.company_id = sc.id AND sc.status = '1' INNER JOIN idb_account_role_relation iarr ON ia.id = iarr.account_id AND iarr.status = '1' INNER JOIN idb_department d ON d.id = iarr.department_id AND d.status = '1' WHERE d.department_code = 'BOND' AND ia.status = '1'
SQL.FetchAccountGroupSQL: SELECT agm.account_id, agm.account_group_id, ag.group_name, ag.description AS account_group_description, ag.group_level AS account_group_level, ag.dept_id AS department_id, d.name AS department_name, d.code AS department_code, d.description AS department_description, d.is_public AS department_is_public FROM account_group_member agm INNER JOIN account_group ag ON agm.account_group_id = ag.id AND ag.status = '1' INNER JOIN department d ON ag.dept_id = d.id AND d.status = '1';
SQL.FetchAccountPermissionSQL: SELECT agm.account_id, agm.account_group_id, cp.id AS permission_id, cp.name AS permission_name, cp.family AS permission_family FROM account_group_member agm INNER JOIN account_group_console_permission agcp ON agcp.account_group_id = agm.account_group_id INNER JOIN console_permission cp ON cp.id = agcp.console_permission_id;
SQL.FetchBondTypeSelectiveSQL: SELECT bts.id, bts.selective_code, bts.type_id, bts.status, bgt.name, bgt.code, bgt.description, bgt.product FROM bond_type_selective bts LEFT JOIN bond_goods_type bgt ON bts.type_id = bgt.id;
SQL.FetchConstantsSQL: SELECT id, name, value, status, create_time, constants_key FROM constants WHERE status = '1' order by constants_key, name, value;
SQL.FetchChinaBondDeviatedValueSQL: SELECT Id, company_id, bond_type_id, bond_type_name, deviated_value, status, modify_time FROM china_bond_deviated_value WHERE status = '1';
SQL.FetchHotKeySQL: SELECT Id, HotKey, FunctionName, Description, Function, Params, ParamSize FROM hot_key;
SQL.FetchBrokerBindingTraderSQL: SELECT id, account_id, status, create_time, bank_agent_id, sort FROM bond_bank_account WHERE status = '1';
SQL.FetchHolidayInfoSQL: SELECT id, delflag, create_date, modify_date, username, inputer, checker, sts, country, market_type, holiday_date, holiday_reason FROM holiday_info WHERE delflag = '0' AND sts = '0' AND market_type = "CIB" order by holiday_date;
SQL.FetchLoginTokenSQL: SELECT ID, ACCOUNT_ID, TOKEN, ACTIVATION, CLIENT_TYPE, IP, SERVER, STATUS FROM idb_login_status;

SQL.FetchSwSectorInfoSQL: SELECT id, delflag, create_date, modify_date, SW_External_Code, SW_Internal_Code, SW_Level, SW_Name, SW_English_Name, SW_Upper_Grade_Code, SW_Status FROM p_sw_sector_info WHERE delflag = '0';
SQL.FetchProvinceInfoSQL: SELECT id, Area_Code, Area_English_Name, Area_Name, Area_Level, Area_Upper_Grade_Code FROM p_province_info WHERE delflag = '0';
